author: eTN Editor
title: Ministers visit Desroches Island and meet with hotel staff
text:
Ministers visit Desroches Island and meet with hotel staff     
Minister Idith Alexander, the Minister responsible for Labor and Human Resources, and Minister Alain St.Ange, the Minister responsible for Tourism and Culture, accompanied by PS Veronique Bresson and Director General Finesse of the Ministry of Human Resources have visited Desroches Island to meet the island's hotel staff now that a change of management company is eminent. It is Minister Alexander who initiated this day's visit to the island in order to meet with hotel staff and the hotel's management. 
Following a visit to all the departments with one-to-one meetings with hotel staff, the ministers met the hotel's management and agreed that a follow-up meeting would be held when the new management of the island's hotel confirms their proposed taking over of Desroches Island Hotel. 
Minister Alexander and Minister St.Ange both said that the visit was very fruitful and that they found the interaction with the individual staff members interesting. Both ministers said that it was encouraging to see many staff members with long lengths of service on the island. 
Seychelles is a founding member of the International Coalition of Tourism Partners (ICTP) . For more information on Seychelles Minister of Tourism and Culture Alain St.Ange, click here . Source: Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture
